component.name: DEG2Rnk
component.doc: Takes gene expression values and produces ranked list of genes (.rnk file) that can be fed into a pre-ranked GSEA analysis.
component.author: Christian Frech

input.name: deg
input.doc: Genes with expression values as produced by DESeq2

input.name: annotation
input.doc: Annotation table to translate gene IDs into gene names (HGNC). The first column is assumed to contain the IDs, the second the names.

output.name: rnk
output.doc: List of genes ranked by -log10(pvalue), with the correct sign for genes expressed into different directions (up or down).

parameter.name: colFC
parameter.doc: Name of column containing fold change.

parameter.name: minP
parameter.doc: Minimum p-value for a gene to include in output.

parameter.name: rankBy
parameter.doc: Rank by p-value ('p', default), fold-change ('fc'), or the combination of both ('pi'). 'pi' is computed by multiplying fold-change with -log10(p-value) according to Xiao et al. (2014) (http://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pubmed/22321699). If ranked by fold-change, an additional cut-off on the minimum p-value (parameter 'minP') is recommended (e.g. '0.1') to exclude genes with insignificant fold-changes caused by highly variable expression measurements.
